column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Now the wine.  I expect that a Spanish restaurant should have all good wine on their list
column2: but I tried a couple different kinds on my first visit that I wasn't too thrilled with
column3: so this time I stuck to the sangria
column4: which was kind of weak-flavored.  At least it was refreshing and not overly sweet
column5: and it did manage to give me a little kick.
